verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, do \w not|strong="H1732"\w* rebuke \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H2142"\w* anger \w or|strong="H2142"\w* discipline \w me|strong="H2142"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w Your|strong="H2142"\w* wrath.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* arrows \w have|strong="H3068"\w* pierced \w me|strong="H3256"\w* deeply, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w has|strong="H3068"\w* pressed down \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*.

There \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no soundness \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* body \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* anger; there \w is|strong="H3027"\w* no rest \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* bones \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* sin.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H6440"\w* iniquities \w have|strong="H7965"\w* overwhelmed \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* burden too heavy \w to|strong="H6440"\w* bear.
\w My|strong="H3588"\w* wounds \w are|strong="H5771"\w* foul \w and|strong="H7218"\w* festering \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sinful folly.
\w I|strong="H6440"\w* am bent \w and|strong="H6440"\w* brought low; \w all|strong="H6440"\w* day \w long|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H6440"\w* go about mourning.

\w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* loins \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w burning|strong="H1980"\w* pain, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* soundness remains \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* body.
\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am numb \w and|strong="H1320"\w* badly crushed; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* groan \w in|strong="H1320"\w* anguish \w of|strong="H4390"\w* heart.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord, \w my|strong="H5704"\w* every desire \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w*; \w my|strong="H5704"\w* groaning \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H5704"\w* hidden \w from|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* heart pounds, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* strength fails, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* light \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* eyes \w has|strong="H3605"\w* faded.

\w My|strong="H5800"\w* beloved \w and|strong="H5869"\w* friends shun \w my|strong="H5800"\w* disease, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5800"\w* kinsmen \w stand|strong="H5869"\w* \w at|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* distance.

Those \w who|strong="H7350"\w* seek \w my|strong="H5048"\w* life lay snares; those \w who|strong="H7350"\w* wish \w me|strong="H5048"\w* harm speak destruction, plotting deceit all day \w long|strong="H7350"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1696"\w* \w like|strong="H1897"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deaf \w man|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* hear; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w like|strong="H1897"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mute \w man|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H1696"\w* open \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* am \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2795"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*, whose \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* offers \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w reply|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* wait \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* answer, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*, “Let \w them|strong="H6030"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* gloat \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w*— \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* taunt \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* foot slips.”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w ready|strong="H4131"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w fall|strong="H4131"\w*, \w and|strong="H7272"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* pain \w is|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.
\w Yes|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* confess \w my|strong="H3588"\w* iniquity; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am troubled \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sin.

Many \w are|strong="H2403"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* enemies \w without|strong="H3588"\w* cause,\f + \fr 38:19 \ft One DSS manuscript; MT My enemies are vigorous and strong\f* \w and|strong="H2403"\w* many hate \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w without|strong="H3588"\w* reason.\f + \fr 38:19 \ft See John 15:25\f*

\w Those|strong="H8130"\w* \w who|strong="H2416"\w* repay \w my|strong="H8267"\w* good \w with|strong="H2416"\w* evil attack \w me|strong="H8130"\w* \w for|strong="H2416"\w* pursuing \w the|strong="H8130"\w* good.

\w Do|strong="H7999"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* forsake \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w be|strong="H7451"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* far \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w me|strong="H7291"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* \w God|strong="H7999"\w*.
Come quickly \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w help|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* Savior.
